name: QUEEN-DIANA
description: QUEEN-DIANA  - Makes it easy and fun to use Whatsapp.

DIANA_SESSION.description:
if you don't have Bot session, scan qr using below url 
 https://replit.com/@kavishkaya/Queen-Diana-MD?v=1?outputonly=1&lite=1

MENU_LOGO.description: you can change your menu logo photo

VIDEO_DOWNLOADING.description: You can change video downloading massage using this

VIDEO_UPLOADING.description: You can change video uploading massage using this

SONG_DOWNLOADING.description: You can change music downloading massage using this

SONG_UPLOADING.description: You can change music uploading massage using this

STICKER_PACK.description: You can change sticker pack name

STICKER_AUTHOR.description: You can change sticker pack authour

CAPTION.description: You can change image/video caption using this

ANTIBAD_WORD.description: When you tern on this option, any person remove automatically using bad word

AUTO_REPLY.description: Send reply to some massages automatically

STICKER_REPLY.description: Send sticker reply to some massages automatically

ANTI_LINK.description: When you tern on this option, any person remove automatically using any link

TIME_ZONE.description: Enter your country time zone.id don't know this pass this

AUTO_BIO.description: this can change your profile detail automatically

LANGUAGE.description:
You can change your bot language using this. 
 for Sinhala use SI 
 for English use EN

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: you can change your alive massage
ALIVE_MESSAGE.value:
```ðŸ‘‹ Hey there, I'm alive now```

ALIVE_LOGO.description: you can change your alive photo

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: This massage using when you leaving group using '.kickme' command
KICKME_MESSAGE.value: ```ðŸ¤  its time to leave bye bye```

BLOCK_CHAT.description:
Using this option, 
 not sending bot's massages to you entered numbers

WELCOME_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WELCOME

GOOD_BYE_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as GOOG BYE

BOT_NAME.description: You can Change bot name using this

NO_LOG.description: Set true if you don't want to see error log.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: This massage using you block person using '.block'

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: This massage using you unblock person using '.unblock'

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: This massage working when you using '.mute' command

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: This massage working when you using '.unmute' command

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: This massage working you when give admin to person using '.promote'

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: This massage working when you remove admin from person using '.demote'

BAN_MESSAGE.description: This massage working when you remove person from group using '.kick'

ADD_MESSAGE.description: This massage working when you add person to group using '.add'

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Enter you entered Heroku app name above

REMOVE_BG_API_KEY.description: log https://www.remove.bg web site and get API key using this link --> https://www.remove.bg/dashboard#api-key

NO_ONLINE.description: Type true if you don't want to appear online.
